structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Exercise of powers in urban-county governments.

text.section: In urban-county governments powers delegated in this chapter to the county judge/executive shall be exercised by the official in whom the chief executive power is vested.
In urban-county governments powers delegated in this chapter to the fiscal court shall be exercised by the body in which the chief legislative power is vested.

law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1982.
